ch.epfl.alpano.gui

Class PanoramaRendererExecutionPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.alpano.gui.PanoramaRendererExecutionPool

  • public final class PanoramaRendererExecutionPool
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates the picture given a painter and the parameters of the panorama
    Author:
    Martin Cibils (261746), Jeremy Mion (261178)

    • Method Detail

      • renderPanorama

        public static javafx.scene.image.Image renderPanorama(Panorama pano,
                                                      ImagePainter imgPainter)
        Renders the image for a given panorama. This is a multithreaded method designed for rapid rendering.
        Parameters:
        pano - Parameters of the panorama. The information about the image to create.
        imgPainter - Painter of the image.
        Returns:
        Image of the panorama

      • updateExecutionStateProperty

        public static void updateExecutionStateProperty()
        Ensures that the stateOfExecution is up to date with the number of collums calculated.

      • stateOfEecution

        public static javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty stateOfEecution()
        Retrives the number of collums that the render has calculated so far. The call to resetStateOf execution must be done if we are rendering multiple panorama to ensure that any thread using stateOfExecution for progress displays the correct progress.
        Returns:
        the number of collums that have been rendered.
